definition: to peel/to strip/to peel off/to come off (of tissue, skin, covering etc)
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: From a research standpoint, have those divestitures had any effect?
sentences.chinese: 從研究的角度看，這些剝離有效果了嗎？

sentences.english: The human remains in those caves hadn't been de-fleshed, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而那些洞穴裏的人類屍體並沒有被剝離皮肉。

sentences.english: The iliopsoas is also separated from the capsule by blunt dissection and retracted medially.
sentences.chinese: 髂腰肌也從關節囊上被鈍性剝離並向內側牽開。

sentences.english: Several studies have shown that the investment in future stars rises sharply once laggards have been dumped.
sentences.chinese: 的部門被剝離，“明日之星”得到的投資會迅速增加。

sentences.english: The Journal also pointed to other recent players in the divestiture game.
sentences.chinese: 該報同時還列舉了剝離遊戲中的其他一些玩家。

sentences.english: Failure meant a stripping away of the inessential.
sentences.chinese: 失敗將那些非本質的東西都剝離了。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 makes a positive study of divestiture performance of the listed-company.
sentences.chinese: 第四章做了一個上市公司資產剝離的市場績效分析。

sentences.english: Bioleaching experiments on the open stripe nickel ore in Jinchuan Mine of China were carried out.
sentences.chinese: 進行了金川露天剝離鎳礦的生物浸出實驗。

sentences.english: Feeding can be done automatically find all the work of stripping paper recycling collection.
sentences.chinese: 能自動完成輸紙摸切剝離收紙工作循環。

sentences.english: The invention further discloses a processing technique of the easily stripped ceramic applique;
sentences.chinese: 本發明還公開了一種易剝離陶瓷貼花加工工藝。

sentences.english: Then it is ready to be peeled off, cut and sewn.
sentences.chinese: 然後，將它剝離，裁剪及車縫。

sentences.english: Its used to determine the peeling strength between the sole and the upper of a shoe .
sentences.chinese: 本機適用於檢驗成鞋鞋底和鞋幫之間的剝離強度。

sentences.english: The lateral approach is essentially dependent upon elevation of the insertion of the gluteus medius and minimus .
sentences.chinese: 外側入路主要依賴於臀中肌和臀小肌止點的剝離。

sentences.english: The recent conditions of research on wheel spalling in North American Railway are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 回顧北美鐵路研究車輪剝離的近況。

sentences.english: You can also peel peaches, plums and apricots and boil or steam them.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以剝離桃子，李子和杏和煮沸或蒸汽。

definition: hidden beneath the surface/buried and concealed
to cut off/to chop sth in half
expansion/dilation/to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)/to broaden
to bring up to full strength/to make up a deficiency/to fill (a vacancy, gap etc)
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
